sn35.233:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca anando ayasma ca kamabhu kosambiyam viharanti ghositarame.
sn35.233:1.2: Atha kho ayasma kamabhu sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodi.
sn35.233:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma kamabhu ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
sn35.233:2.1: “Kim nu kho, avuso ananda, cakkhu rupanam samyojanam, rupa cakkhussa samyojanam …pe…
sn35.233:2.2: jivha rasanam samyojanam, rasa jivhaya samyojanam …pe…
sn35.233:2.3: mano dhammanam samyojanam, dhamma manassa samyojanan”ti?
sn35.233:3.1: “Na kho, avuso kamabhu, cakkhu rupanam samyojanam, na rupa cakkhussa samyojanam.
sn35.233:3.2: Yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago, tam tattha samyojanam …pe…
sn35.233:3.3: na jivha rasanam samyojanam, na rasa jivhaya samyojanam …pe…
sn35.233:3.4: na mano dhammanam samyojanam, na dhamma manassa samyojanam.
sn35.233:3.5: Yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago tam tattha samyojanam.
sn35.233:4.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, kalo ca balibaddo odato ca balibaddo ekena damena va yottena va samyutta assu.
sn35.233:4.3: ‘kalo balibaddo odatassa balibaddassa samyojanam, odato balibaddo kalassa balibaddassa samyojanan’ti, samma nu kho so vadamano vadeyya”ti?
sn35.233:4.5: “Na kho, avuso, kalo balibaddo odatassa balibaddassa samyojanam, napi odato balibaddo kalassa balibaddassa samyojanam.
sn35.233:4.6: Yena ca kho te ekena damena va yottena va samyutta, tam tattha samyojanam.
sn35.233:4.7: Evameva kho, avuso, na cakkhu rupanam samyojanam, na rupa cakkhussa samyojanam …pe…
sn35.233:4.10: yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago, tam tattha samyojanan”ti.
